title: What was life like in pre-industrial Britain? - Quora

response.answer_text: Roughly the same standard of living as Africa or parts of Asia. Outside of the big cities there was no sewer system, the only source of work and food came from the land and water was from the nearest river. In the big cities sewage was simply dropped in the river (think who ended up drinking it) and food was simply transported in. In short, miserable.
